## Tree.getProof() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates a merkle proof for a given key that can then be verified to be sure that the key and its value exist in the tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getProof(key: Buffer): Proof;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | Buffer | The key for which a proof is needed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Proof](./iavl.proof.md)

The proof for the given key.
